meanings.sent1: The snake constricts its prey to catch it.
meanings.sent2: The hairband constricts my wrist a little.
meanings.sent3: The constricting hug from the bear made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His fear constricts his ability to speak up.
meanings.sent5: The constricting feeling of the tight jeans was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: The rules constrict our freedom to choose.
meanings.sent2: The budget constricts our spending on luxuries.
meanings.sent3: The constricting traffic jam made us late for the party.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety constricts her from trying new things.
meanings.sent5: The constricting schedule leaves no time for relaxation.

meanings.sent1: She constricts the clay to shape it into a bowl.
meanings.sent2: The python constricts its prey before swallowing it whole.
meanings.sent3: The constricting stress ball helps relieve tension.
meanings.sent4: The cold constricts the metal, making it harder to bend.
meanings.sent5: The constricting grip of the vice tightened around the pipe.
